abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32777861, pmid32770825, pmid32782040, pmid32772324, pmid32771058, pmid32772679, pmid32778684, pmid32779139, pmid32776534, pmid32777974
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.08.14
